content.html: If you keep track of your old URLs in a data file or directly in the content’s YFM, I guess you can get both old and new Webmentions. I think that’s what @AaronGustafson did for Jekyll, and I plan to do that for @eleven_ty.
content.text: If you keep track of your old URLs in a data file or directly in the content’s YFM, I guess you can get both old and new Webmentions. I think that’s what @AaronGustafson did for Jekyll, and I plan to do that for @eleven_ty.
